text:
Share On more Share On more

Anyway, Laura had a very important question for Jen: Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF

And Jen finally set the record straight: LAURA IS HER BFFL. Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF

Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF

I mean, not gonna lie, I'd also be a little sad if my best friend was off riding Jet Skis with Amy Schumer and the whole world starting calling them best friends. Jlaw #maniac

Jen continued to reassure Laura that no one could take her place, admitting that she talks about her so much that even Emma Stone asks about her. Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF Tap to play or pause GIF

Obviously Laura was the hero of the night, not only for making sure we all knew who Jennifer Lawrence's true best friend is, but also for the question she asked Jax, of Vanderpump Rules.
